backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to display images on innovation cards, including mapped filenames, affected file, dependencies, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, outlining components, pages, hooks, styles, and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root element and loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with React Query’s QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing the Swift Energy logo, copyright notice with caffeine.ai attribution, and a "Powered by CK Education" tagline.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with Swift Energy branding and navigation links, featuring a desktop menu and a mobile hamburger menu using a slide-out sheet.
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Reusable image carousel component built with shadcn/ui that auto-plays every 4 seconds, pauses on hover, and supports swipe and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the Header, page content via Outlet, and Footer in a full-height flex column.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, handling authenticated and anonymous identities and initializing access control when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and login status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty hook file indicating no backend queries are required for this static website.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining Swift Energy’s OKLCH-based color system, light/dark themes, and utility patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that creates the root, applies global styles, and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Implements the About page with an image slider, hero section, goals/vision/values cards, and a team members section describing roles and bios.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Implements the History page with an image slider, hero section, and a timeline of milestones showing Swift Energy’s journey and achievements.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the Home page hero section introducing Swift Energy, call-to-action buttons, and a core values section rendered as cards.
frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx: Implements the Innovations page with an image slider, hero section, and detailed cards showcasing the team’s innovation projects.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Empty or unimplemented page file with no content defined.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters safely.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens via CSS variables, animations, container settings, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata snapshot describing the Swift Energy Website, including schema/version info, a high-level architecture summary, and a detailed catalog of existing frontend features and pages. Used for build planning and feature tracking rather than runtime behavior.
